paragraphs.content: I exhort therefore, that, first of all, supplications, prayers, intercessions, and giving of thanks, be made for all men;
paragraphs.contentHtml: I exhort therefore, that, first of all, supplications, prayers, intercessions, and giving of thanks, be made for all men;

paragraphs.content: For kings, and for all that are in authority; that we may lead a quiet and peaceable life in all godliness and honesty.
paragraphs.contentHtml: For kings, and for all that are in authority; that we may lead a quiet and peaceable life in all godliness and honesty.

paragraphs.content: For this is good and acceptable in the sight of God our Saviour;
paragraphs.contentHtml: For this is good and acceptable in the sight of God our Saviour;

paragraphs.content: Who will have all men to be saved, and to come unto the knowledge of the truth.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Who will have all men to be saved, and to come unto the knowledge of the truth.

paragraphs.content: For there is one God, and one mediator between God and men, the man Christ Jesus;
paragraphs.contentHtml: For there is one God, and one mediator between God and men, the man Christ Jesus;

paragraphs.content: Who gave himself a ransom for all, to be testified in due time.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Who gave himself a ransom for all, to be testified in due time.

paragraphs.content: Whereunto I am ordained a preacher, and an apostle, (I speak the truth in Christ, and lie not;) a teacher of the Gentiles in faith and verity.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Whereunto I am ordained a preacher, and an apostle, (I speak the truth in Christ, and lie not;) a teacher of the Gentiles in faith and verity.

paragraphs.content: I will therefore that men pray every where, lifting up holy hands, without wrath and doubting.
paragraphs.contentHtml: I will therefore that men pray every where, lifting up holy hands, without wrath and doubting.

paragraphs.content: In like manner also, that women adorn themselves in modest apparel, with shamefacedness and sobriety; not with broided hair, or gold, or pearls, or costly array;
paragraphs.contentHtml: In like manner also, that women adorn themselves in modest apparel, with shamefacedness and sobriety; not with broided hair, or gold, or pearls, or costly array;

paragraphs.content: But (which becometh women professing godliness) with good works.
paragraphs.contentHtml: But (which becometh women professing godliness) with good works.

paragraphs.content: Let the woman learn in silence with all subjection.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Let the woman learn in silence with all subjection.

paragraphs.content: But I suffer not a woman to teach, nor to usurp authority over the man, but to be in silence.
paragraphs.contentHtml: But I suffer not a woman to teach, nor to usurp authority over the man, but to be in silence.

paragraphs.content: For Adam was first formed, then Eve.
paragraphs.contentHtml: For Adam was first formed, then Eve.

paragraphs.content: And Adam was not deceived, but the woman being deceived was in the transgression.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And Adam was not deceived, but the woman being deceived was in the transgression.

paragraphs.content: Notwithstanding she shall be saved in childbearing, if they continue in faith and charity and holiness with sobriety.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Notwithstanding she shall be saved in childbearing, if they continue in faith and charity and holiness with sobriety.
